verbose_text: CRP also induced IL-6 and thrombospondin (TSP-1) mRNA and protein expression in human renal tubular epithelial HK-2 cells via activation of the p38 mitogen activated protein kinase and NF-kappaB signaling pathways as well as TGF-beta1 expression, suggesting that CRP plays an important role in the propagation and prolongation of inflammation in renal fibrosis.
evidence: CRP also induced IL-6 and thrombospondin
